testcase.name: Sauce Demo unauthenticated HomePage › Verify unauthenticated Homepage and Login
testcase.system-out:
- Launching test website - https://www.saucedemo.com/ - Title is as Expected - 'Swag Labs' - Entering Username - Entering Password - Click Login in Sauce Demo Page
[[ATTACHMENT|..\test-results\001-loginPage-Sauce-Demo-u-e0f8d-ticated-Homepage-and-Login--chromium\test-finished-1.png]]

testcase.name: Sauce Demo Product listing page › Verify Product Listing page
testcase.system-out:
- Going to inventory page - Clicking on the Sauce Lap Backpack - Clicking Add to cart on the 'Sauce Lap Backpack' Item - Remove Button is visible after adding the item to cart - Cart Badge has : 1 item - Going to Cart
[[ATTACHMENT|..\test-results\002-productListingPage-Sau-9e98c-erify-Product-Listing-page--chromium\test-finished-1.png]]

testcase.name: Sauce Demo cart page › Verify sauce demo cart and the items
testcase.system-out:
- Going to Cart page - Inventory item "Sauce Labs Backpack" is available in the cart list
[[ATTACHMENT|..\test-results\003-cart-Sauce-Demo-cart-p-33c82-ce-demo-cart-and-the-items--chromium\test-finished-1.png]]

testcase.name: Sauce Demo checkout page › Verify sauce demo checkout
testcase.system-out:
- Going to Cart page - Going to checkout step 1 - The URL is correct: /checkout-step-one.html - Entering User information - Summary information present - Finish checkout - Verified Complete checkout page - Back Home button clicked on complete checkout page
[[ATTACHMENT|..\test-results\004-checkout-Sauce-Demo-ch-cabb3-Verify-sauce-demo-checkout--chromium\test-finished-1.png]]
